Index.p_main: Hello there! I'm Danila and I'm thrilled to have you here and showcase my passion for frontend development
Index.p_description: If you're ready to take your online presence to the next level, I'd love to work with you. Let's do it together and create a visually stunning and highly functional website that captivates your audience. Feel free to reach out to me to discuss your project or for any inquiries.

About.p_about_1: I'm Danila, a frontend developer with 2+ years of experience. I specialize in crafting responsive and user-friendly high performance websites that seamlessly adapt to various devices and screen sizes.
About.p_about_2: My journey into frontend development began with a strong fascination for the intersection of technology and design. I am captivated by the power of coding to transform ideas into tangible digital experiences.
About.p_about_3: I have constantly pushed myself to stay up-to-date with the latest web technologies and design trends, allowing me to deliver modern and innovative solutions to myself and my clients.
About.p_about_4: If you're looking for a frontend developer who is dedicated, detail-oriented, and eager to bring your ideas to life, I would love to collaborate with you.
About.p_about_travel: Also I'm traveling the world, getting to know the culture of different countries and working in the process. Now I'm living in Thailand.
About.whatIUseInMyWork: What do I use in my work?
About.javascriptDescription_about: ES5: if I have to work with old code. ES6+: in all other cases
About.typescriptDescription_about: At the moment I use it in all new websites and applications
About.reactDescription_about: Next.js 13: use in all new projects
About.cssFrameworksDescription_about: SCSS/SASS, CSS modules, Tailwind, MaterialUI, Bootstrap
About.laravelMixDescription_about: I use it if I develop a website on a clean html/css/javascript without additional libraries and frameworks
About.webpackDescription_about: Used by default in the React.js
About.figmaDescription_about: Most often used in web design development
About.AdobeXdDescription_about: I use it if for some reason I can’t use figma
About.adobeAfterEffectsDescription_about: I use it in my work with motion design

Landing.description_landing: Suitable for those who need a one-page site with all the information in one placе.

Multipage.description_multipage: Among the standard pages on sites of this type, sections can be distinguished: "Home", "About the company", "Our services / products", etc.

BusinessCard.description_businessCard: This site is the best solution if you want to briefly tell about yourself, your company, product or service.
BusinessCard.whatsInclude1_businessCard: Responsive template design for all devices
